about_the_game:
In this first-person adventure game, you’ll follow the story of a young man who, unknowingly, has been thrown into a world where the rules of logic have been left behind. It all begins with a seemingly simple mission: buying eggs for his mother. But what seemed like an everyday task transforms into an extraordinary experience, thanks to a group of cosmic comedians armed with magical text boxes that write comments coming to life and altering the world in real time.

As you progress, you’ll witness situations ranging from hilarious to utterly absurd. You might find yourself speeding through a jelly-like landscape in a car or piloting a drone solely to track animals that seem more interested in mocking you than being found. The comedians don’t just sit back and watch; they constantly introduce random challenges that will test your skills and creativity, from frantic races against flying snails to solving puzzles with answers that only make sense in their twisted universe.

The game doesn’t fall short on modes and mechanics: you’ll explore a variety of worlds and levels that feel like they’ve been plucked from a delirious dream, each filled with side quests designed to challenge you. From collecting impossible objects to participating in utterly ridiculous talent competitions, there’s never a dull moment. Each level is packed with secrets and hidden paths, rewarding the most observant players with unexpected "and often comically useless" discoveries.

The blend of a surreal narrative, unpredictable events, and constant interaction with the comedians “writing” the world ensures that every playthrough is unique. While absurd humor lies at the heart of the game, you’ll also encounter genuine challenges that will test your skills as a player. Get ready to laugh, get frustrated, and be surprised as you embark on an adventure where the ordinary becomes extraordinary, and you’ll never be able to guess what happens next.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 11 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E5200
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 460 or Radeon HD 7770
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 11 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4570
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 750
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: You play as a youngster sent by your mother to buy eggs, a task that seems simple at first. However, as you journey through, you find yourself trapped in a surreal world crafted by comedians, where written words mysteriously turn into unexpected realities, making your errand a wild adventure.
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America
